title: Acupuncture and Integrative Medicine in Laporte, CO | Equine Medical Service
description: Acupuncture and Integrative Medicine - Alternative and Complementary Therapies are continually being studied and the most effective of these are being utilized to aid in issues of lameness and
cleaned_text: Alternative and Complementary Therapies are continually being studied and the most effective of these are being utilized to aid in issues of lameness and disease. We are currently utilizing chiropractic, acupuncture and herbal therapies where indicated. Complementary Therapies are continually being studied and the most effective of these are being utilized to aid in issues of lameness and other diseases. Dr. Landes is now certified in Medical Acupuncture which allows him to bring the latest knowledge in Complementary Medicine to treat your horse. We have integrated acupuncture, manual therapy (chiropractic manipulation) cold laser therapy into the traditional western medicine as indicated.
